metadata.title: RA Family: Can I use this board with my own voice recognition software ?

sections.content:
Question:
Can I use this board with my own voice recognition software ?
Answer:
Yes. Please refer our Quick Start Guide in GitHub.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
